select.sql: insert into kup_dppb select #secorp#, prodcd, prodtx, pdmktx, efctdt, inefdt, protno, pddpfg, prodtp, prodtg, prentp, pdcrcy, brchfg, custfg, debttp, mginfg, mgindy, isdrft, prodst, presal, tyinno, tmstmp from kup_dppb where corpno = #cecorp# and prodcd = #prodcd#
